name: es6-module-transpiler-amd-formatter
description: ES6 Module Transpiler Extension to Output AMD define() Format.
author: Caridy Patino <caridy@gmail.com>

scripts.pretest: nyc --silent ./node_modules/.bin/compile-modules convert -f ../../../../index.js test/**/*.js -o ./build && AMDFORMATTER_NAMED_MODULES=false nyc --silent --no-clean ./node_modules/.bin/compile-modules convert -f ../../../../index.js test/fixtures/6.js -o ./build &&  AMDFORMATTER_DIRECT_EXPORTS=true nyc --silent --no-clean ./node_modules/.bin/compile-modules convert -f ../../../../index.js test/fixtures/8.js -o ./build && nyc --silent --no-clean node test/format-unnamed && nyc --silent --no-clean node test/format-direct
scripts.test: mocha test/formatter && nyc report && nyc check-coverage
